# Topsis-Sarthak-401903029

It takes a csv file, along with weights and impacts, and displays the topsis score

## Installation

`pip install topsis-sarthak-401903029`

## How to use it?

In Command Prompt

> Topsis-Sarthak-401903029 data.csv "1,1,1,1,1" "+,-,+,+,+"
